mapper.insert: INSERT INTO d_techie ( techie_id , techie_name , true_name , passwd , id_card_no , account_amount , wjs_amount , yjs_amount , sex , unit , area_info , store_address , province_id , city_id , area_id , fj_landmark , qq , img , i_isjob , title , title_sc_id , rz_position , good_at , store_id , ds_total_num , ds_total_amount , techie_class_id , occupation , evaluation_good_probability , techie_introduce , evaluate_sum , state , add_time , v_rl_acct , v_rl_acctpass , v_rl_voip , v_rl_voippass ) VALUES ( #{techieId} , #{techieName} , #{trueName} , #{passwd} , #{idCardNo} , #{accountAmount} , #{wjsAmount} , #{yjsAmount} , #{sex} , #{unit} , #{areaInfo} , #{storeAddress} , #{provinceId} , #{cityId} , #{areaId} , #{fjLandmark} , #{qq} , #{img} , #{iisjob} , #{title} , #{titleScId} , #{rzPosition} , #{goodAt} , #{storeId} , #{dsTotalNum} , #{dsTotalAmount} , #{techieClassId} , #{occupation} , #{evaluationGoodProbability} , #{techieIntroduce} , #{evaluateSum} , #{state} , #{addTime} , #{vrlAcct} , #{vrlAcctpass} , #{vrlVoip} , #{vrlVoippass} )
mapper.update: UPDATE d_techie SET techie_name = #{techieName} , true_name = #{trueName} , passwd = #{passwd} , id_card_no = #{idCardNo} , account_amount = #{accountAmount} , wjs_amount = #{wjsAmount} , yjs_amount = #{yjsAmount} , sex = #{sex} , unit = #{unit} , area_info = #{areaInfo} , store_address = #{storeAddress} , province_id = #{provinceId} , city_id = #{cityId} , area_id = #{areaId} , fj_landmark = #{fjLandmark} , qq = #{qq} , img = #{img} , i_isjob = #{iisjob} , title = #{title} , title_sc_id = #{titleScId} , rz_position = #{rzPosition} , good_at = #{goodAt} , store_id = #{storeId} , ds_total_num = #{dsTotalNum} , ds_total_amount = #{dsTotalAmount} , techie_class_id = #{techieClassId} , occupation = #{occupation} , evaluation_good_probability = #{evaluationGoodProbability} , techie_introduce = #{techieIntroduce} , evaluate_sum = #{evaluateSum} , state = #{state} , add_time = #{addTime} , v_rl_acct = #{vrlAcct} , v_rl_acctpass = #{vrlAcctpass} , v_rl_voip = #{vrlVoip} , v_rl_voippass = #{vrlVoippass} WHERE techie_id = #{techieId}
mapper.select: SELECT FROM d_techie where 1=1 order by ds_total_num desc limit 0 ,3

select * from d_techie
state = 1
and techie_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{typeValue}),'%')
and techie_id like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{typeValue}),'%')
order by #{orderBy} DESC
limit #{pageInfo.begin} , #{pageInfo.end}

select COUNT(*) from d_techie
state = 1
and techie_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{typeValue}),'%')
and techie_id like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{typeValue}),'%')
order by #{orderBy} DESC
